entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
